author: FHead
body: This PR is the 80X backport of #16284.  The DQM setup for the monitoring of the trigger paths requested in https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-1078 is asked for integration. No C++ code change is proposed, we require only python level changes.
title: HIN High-pT trigger DQM for 80X (CMSHLT-1078)
